name: Not That Sad Shooter
description:
Be a soldier in a world filled with nothing but you, your trusty and not at all rusty gun with infinite ammo... And... Zombies!!!

Get rid of them, as doing that becomes harder and harder and try to get the best score you can.

Good luck and have fun playing.

Things used for making this game

  • Font used: LeroyLetteringLightBETA01
  • Graphics library: SDL2
  • Programming language c++
  • For drawing the graphics, Gimp
  • For coding, the xed 2.4.2 text editor

How it fits the theme? By: Being able to shoot only one bullet at a time and being confined in a small area.
